column5: We got up this morning Wife 6am her family's coming around 1 for Turkey, by 10:10 we were done breakfast & Barb phone my daughter in Toronto & my 4.5 yr old Grand Daughter answered the phone said what Santa brought her & talked for a bit, then Barb asked if Marley wanted to talk to Papa or Uncle Bill or Joe & she replied NO I have too many toy's to play with, then she gave the phone to my Daughter & never came back to it, We're heading down tomorrow for the day so it is kind of Funny Merry Christmas Richard

My 4 year of old does not want to talk to grandparents or relatives.  We force her and eventually she does it.  THe two older kids love talking to the grandparents and thanking them for the gifts.  Don't feel put out it is just the age.  I however would have made her talk to at least say thank you.
I love kids at that age.... our two grand kids are here today.. 3-1/2 and 1-1/2.  It's ALL about them...  Loving every minute of it.
Ya can't wait for tomorrow,they'll be spoiled all day Richard
Yep,Nanny walks in the room,Im joe blow.LOL
